metaTitle: IT Products for Kazakhstan — Modern Solutions and Innovations
metaDescription: I create my own IT products for Kazakhstan: convenient services, mobile apps, and digital solutions that help users and businesses thrive in the tech era.

banner.title: Creating IT Products for the Future of Kazakhstan

bio.title: Biography
bio.text: Alikhan was born on October 27, 2000, in Almaty, Kazakhstan. Since childhood, he has been passionate about chess and football — he became a chess master and played for professional football clubs. In his youth, he faced a choice between sports and studies, and chose the path of programming. He now creates IT products for Kazakhstan, aiming to develop the country's tech sector and realize the ambitious dream of his own large IT company.
